annotations.description: Devon Espinosa created this deliberately non-smoky Penicillin variation during his tenure at The Tasting Kitchen. Although he’s since moved on to another
annotations.title: PUNCH | The Braveheart Cocktail Recipe

textContent:
2 ounces blended Scotch whisky
3/4 ounce lemon juice
3/4 ounce honey-ginger syrup (Or 3/4 ginger juice and 3/4 honey syrup)
2 dashes Angostura bitters

In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients with ice.
Shake well, then strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
